edu.cnm.deepdive.security

Class PasswordGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.security.PasswordGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SecurePasswordGenerator

    public class PasswordGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of a simple password generator. This includes support for elementary character-set-based rules, but not (yet) regular expressions.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sky Link

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String AMBIGUOUS
      Ambiguous characters that may optionally be excluded from the password.
      static int DEFAULT_PASSWORD_LENGTH
      The default password length if none is specified
      static java.lang.String PUNCTUATION
      Punctuation characters that may optionally be included in the password.
